The issue has been raised before, but closed cause new info was needed: 

I'm experiencing a freeze of vs everytime after a copy paste action of any typescript file

I'm using vs2013 with typescript 1.0rc.

When I copy and paste a typescript file in the same project, an endless freeze occurs. It occurs at the 'paste' action. (ctrl-c and ctrl-v)

For me this is new, I dont know it from 0.9.5 for example.

I dont think it has got anything todo with the compiler, since I don't use compile on save.

Comments.Message:
Is this happening with all projects (even just the simple Greeter app when you create a new TypeScript project)? Or is this in a specific project of yours? If the latter are you able to share the project?

One thing to try is turn off Format On Paste. Go to Tools -> Options -> Text Editor -> TypeScript -> Formatting -> Format on paste. Uncheck that and see if it resolves your issue. If so that certainly narrows down the culprit but in either case we'll need to investigate more.
since the install of visual studio update 2rc my problems have gone. I cannot reproduce the problem with current install.
